title: Gross NPAs of Housing Finance Companies rise to 3.3% in December, says Crisil - Moneycontrol.com
content: Gross NPAs of Housing Finance Companies rise to 3.3% in December, says Crisil  Moneycontrol.com
description: This rise is attributable to Reserve Bank of Indiaâ€™s (RBI) November 12, 2021, clarification on recognition and calculation of NPAs, rather than any real mark-down in asset quality, Crisil said.
